definition: Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Leo's also have the potential to become musical maestros .
sentences.chinese: 獅子座也有可能成爲音樂大師。

sentences.english: Leo will respect Virgo's clever and alert mentality.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座能尊重處女座的機智及警惕。

sentences.english: Regulus is the brightest star in the constellation Leo.
sentences.chinese: 軒轅十四是獅子座中最亮的星星。

sentences.english: Astrologically, I observe that Saturn is in Leo.
sentences.chinese: 從占星學角度來說，我觀察到土星的位子處於獅子座。

sentences.english: Leos Carax is aware of the maddening contradiction of his career.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座苔意識到他的職業生涯發瘋的矛盾。

sentences.english: Leo is ruled by the Sun.
sentences.chinese: 太陽是獅子座的守護星。

sentences.english: I’m a typical Leo. I’m faithful but patronizing.
sentences.chinese: 我就是典型的獅子座，忠誠卻又自負。

sentences.english: People with Leo in the Ascendant seem to possess a flair for the life of nobility and regality.
sentences.chinese: 上升星位爲獅子座的人具有追逐高貴與王權的本能。

sentences.english: Let us take a look at the personality traits of the Leo Zodiac sign in detail.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們詳細的看看獅子座有哪些個性特點。

sentences.english: The Fire signs is Aries, Leo and Sagittarius.
sentences.chinese: 火相星座有山羊座，獅子座和射手座。

sentences.english: So is Leo and Taurus compatibility, the best?
sentences.chinese: 因此，獅子座和金牛座最配嗎？

sentences.english: Leo is Fire to the core!
sentences.chinese: 獅子座是徹底的火相星座。

sentences.english: Leo is also persevering person, so the chances for mutual satisfaction are really big.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座也很保守，這大大提高了二者的共同滿意度。

sentences.english: As lunar Fire sign personalities, those with moon in Leo are magnanimous and passionate in the expression of their feelings.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座在表達自己的感情時是坦蕩和熱情的。

sentences.english: Leo'shealth habits : Leos have robust constitutions, supple spines, and good coordination.
sentences.chinese: 獅子座人有着健壯的體魄，極強的柔韌度和協調性。

sentences.english: People like to listen to Leos because they sound strong and powerful.
sentences.chinese: 人們喜歡聽從獅子座的人，因爲他們聽起來鏗鏘有力。

definition: Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
Gemini (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
now hot, now cold/(of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate
to like to look good in the eyes of others/sensitive about how one is regarded by others/proud
